channel.title: Am I allowed to re-release Power-Surge source?
channel.description: Hello, am I allowed to re-release [b]Power-Surge[/b] source? I have the source, and everybody wants it, im asking because i do not want to get a warning or mute / ban. [b]Thanks![/b]

item.title: Am I allowed to re-release Power-Surge source?
item.dc:creator: @Morpheus1 Morpheus-
item.description:
@Morpheus1 wrote:

I will ask Tom about the issue, thanks for your suggestions!

Read full topic
item.source: Am I allowed to re-release Power-Surge source?

item.title: Am I allowed to re-release Power-Surge source?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“tgm clan, post:6, topic:522610”][quote author=casey. link=topic=641110.msg4319665#msg4319665 date=1372046197]
you realize the owner can take legal action if you do this ? 0.o

edit: i sent a pm to tom about this issue, maybe you should pm tom, to clarify your intentions but i dont think this is supported by the creators ._.
[/quote]

No he can’t, jagex can take legal action against him due to jagex still owns that revision he made. Only 317’s are legal i beleive[/quote]
Wrong.

The clients are ripped from Jagex. Most, if not all, servers are hand written (except for a couple parts?).
That’s why you see client’s being taken down and not servers.

However, if you host any rsps, jagex can, and may, take legal action on you.

Read full topic
item.source: Am I allowed to re-release Power-Surge source?

edit: i sent a pm to tom about this issue, maybe you should pm tom, to clarify your intentions but i dont think this is supported by the creators ._.[/quote]

No he can’t, jagex can take legal action against him due to jagex still owns that revision he made. Only 317’s are legal i beleive
